verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'If<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon a <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H7097>among<s%> them and <S%H5414>make<s%> him their <S%H6822>watchman;<s%>
and he <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>coming<s%> upon the <S%H776>land,<s%> and he <S%H8628>blows<s%> on the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> and <S%H2094>warns<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%>

then he who <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> and does not <S%H2094>take<s%> <S%H2094>warning,<s%> and a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> and <S%H3947>takes<s%> him away, his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be on his [own] <S%H7218>head.<s%>

'He <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> but did not <S%H2094>take<s%> <S%H2094>warning;<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be on himself. But had he <S%H2094>taken<s%> <S%H2094>warning,<s%> he would have <S%H4422>delivered<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>

'But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>coming<s%> and does not <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> are not <S%H2094>warned,<s%> and a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> and <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> from them, he is <S%H3947>taken<s%> away in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> I will <S%H1875>require<s%> from the <S%H6822>watchman<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand.<s%>'

"Now as for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> you a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> so you will <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> from My <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H2094>give<s%> them <S%H2094>warning<s%> from Me.

"When I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> 'O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man,<s%> you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%>' and you do not <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H1870>way,<s%> that <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> I will <S%H1245>require<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"But <S%H3588>if<s%> you on your <S%H859>part<s%> <S%H2094>warn<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and he does not <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>way,<s%> he will <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>life.<s%>

"Now as for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3651>'Thus<s%> you have <S%H559>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> and our <S%H9128>sins<s%> are upon us, and we are <S%H4743>rotting<s%> <S%H4743>away<s%> in them; <S%H349>how<s%> then can we <S%H2421>survive<s%>? "'

<S%H559>"Say<s%> to them, 'As I <S%H2416>live!<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> 'I <S%H2654>take<s%> <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> but <S%H3588>rather<s%> <S%H518><s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>way<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%> <S%H7725>Turn<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways!<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> then will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?'

"And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to your <S%H1121>fellow<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H5971>citizens,<s%> 'The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> will not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and as for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> he will not <S%H3782>stumble<s%> because of it in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H7562>wickedness;<s%> whereas a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> will not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2421>live<s%> by his righteousness on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H2398>commits<s%> <S%H2398>sin.<s%>'

"When I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> he will <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> and he [so] <S%H982>trusts<s%> in his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> that he <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3605>none<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of his <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>deeds<s%> will be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> but in that same <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>committed<s%> he will <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"But when I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> 'You will <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%>' and he <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H9128>sin<s%> and <S%H6213>practices<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%>

[if a] <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H7725>restores<s%> a <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> <S%H9608>pays<s%> <S%H9608>back<s%> <S%H1500>what<s%> he has <S%H1500>taken<s%> by <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> by the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which ensure <S%H9132>life<s%> <S%H1115>without<s%> <S%H6213>committing<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> he will <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live;<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H3605>"None<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of his <S%H9128>sins<s%> that he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> will be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> against him. He has <S%H6213>practiced<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> he will <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>

"Yet your <S%H1121>fellow<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H5971>citizens<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>right,<s%>' when it is their own <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H8505>right.<s%>
"When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> then he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in it.

"But when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> and <S%H6213>practices<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> he will <S%H2421>live<s%> by them.

"Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>right.<s%>' O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you according to his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>exile,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> of the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H6412>refugees<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H5892>city<s%> has been <S%H5221>taken.<s%>"

Now the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> upon me in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6412>refugees<s%> <S%H935>came.<s%> And He <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> at the <S%H5704>time<s%> [they] <S%H935>came<s%> to me in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> so my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and I was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H481>speechless.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> they who <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H85>'Abraham<s%> was [only] <S%H259>one,<s%> yet he <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> so to us <S%H7227>who<s%> are <S%H7227>many<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> has been <S%H5414>given<s%> as a <S%H4181>possession.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "You <S%H398>eat<s%> [meat] with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> [in it,] <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to your <S%H1544>idols<s%> as you <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%> Should you then <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>?

"You <S%H5975>rely<s%> on your <S%H2719>sword,<s%> you <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H2930>defiles<s%> his neighbor's <S%H802>wife.<s%> Should you then <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>? '"

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> those <S%H834>who<s%> are in the <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H834>whoever<s%> is in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> to be <S%H398>devoured,<s%> and those <S%H834>who<s%> are in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> and in the <S%H4631>caves<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> of <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and a <S%H4923>waste,<s%> and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of her <S%H5797>power<s%> will <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> that <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through.<s%>

"Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and a <S%H4923>waste<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>"'

"But as for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> your <S%H1121>fellow<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H5971>citizens<s%> who <S%H1696>talk<s%> about you by the <S%H7023>walls<s%> and in the <S%H6607>doorways<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2297>one<s%> <S%H259>another,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>'Come<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H1697>message<s%> is which <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>'

"And they <S%H935>come<s%> to you as <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3996>come,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you [as] My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H1697>words,<s%> but they do not <S%H6213>do<s%> them, for they <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H5690>lustful<s%> <S%H5690>desires<s%> [expressed] by their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> [and] their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1215>gain.<s%>

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you are to them like a <S%H5690>sensual<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> by one who has a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H5059>plays<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> on an instrument; for they <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H1697>words,<s%> but they do not <S%H6213>practice<s%> them.
"So when it <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H935>pass<s%> – as <S%H2009>surely<s%> it will – then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst.<s%>"
